Bolt | San Francisco

- Build the future of online transactions

- Work with the best: https://bolt.com/team

- Job descriptions here: https://bolt.com/jobs

- Hiring across the stack! Backend, frontend, infrastructure, security

- Golang backend, React frontend

Work with a stellar team, solve large technical problems, and create immense value for the world. Make the internet a better place for commerce.

I'm cofounder/ceo. Email me directly: rb ~at~ bolt.com
